medical_history.chief_complaint: Ulceration of the lower right leg
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 2-month history of ulceration on her lower right leg. She reports occasional leg pain and swelling, especially at the end of the day, and states that despite the discomfort from the ulcer, she feels well overall.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Congestive heart failure; varicosities on the lower limbs.
medical_history.social_history: The patient does not drink or smoke.
